metadata.name: Potential Shim Database Persistence via Sdbinst.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects installation of a new shim using sdbinst.exe. Adversaries may establish persistence and/or elevate privileges by executing malicious content triggered by application shims

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sdbinst.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sdbinst.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.sdb')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\msiexec.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\program files (x86)\\iis express\\iisexpressshim.sdb')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\program files\\iis express\\iisexpressshim.sdb')))))

output.summary: Detects installation of a new shim using sdbinst.exe. Adversaries may establish persistence and/or elevate privileges by executing malicious content triggered by application shims
